            background-position: center;

            margin: 200px auto 0px auto;

            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .envelope-msg {
            color: white;
            text-align: center;

        }

        .letter-close {
            display: block;
        }

        .letter-open {
            display: none;
        }

        .rtan {
            background-color: white;


            width: 250px;
            height: 250px;

            background-image: url('https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/proxy/T84YSOup4Tsoa5dD2R4zfOxsddX9QFApA5j5ls5P0m0beP90IwlCCiLki2K3SnIpsHGZ8C83WP4D_eo-eqAtY-VAIjU9sBrlwejLSqyRLvQWKfxDqGzJcL4zBIfiv3AnBmib-j7P9HdU8PIboYA2xjVJ4Q5T2w');

    <script>

        function open_letter() {
            document.getElementsByClassName("letter-close")[0].style.display = 'none'
            document.getElementsByClassName("letter-open")[0].style.display = 'block'
        }

        function go_rtan(){
            alert('Wow! You found it!')
            window.location.href='https://bestwishesfor.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Merry-Christmas-Greetings-Gif.gif'

        }

    </script>

</head>

<body>
    <div class="letter-close">
        <div class="envelope" onclick="open_letter()"></div>
        <h2 class="envelope-msg">OPEN</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="letter-open">
        <div class="rtan" onclick="go_rtan()"></div>
        <h1>SEASON'S GREETINGS!</h1>
        <div class="messagebox">
            MERRY CHRISTMAS ☆ <br />
            AND A HAPPY NEW YEAR! <br />
